assetProfile.address2: Behind Hotel Novotel Opposite Hyatt Hotel Pune Nagar Road
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Vascon Engineers Limited provides engineering, procurement, and construction (EPC) services in India. It operates through EPC, Real Estate Development, and Manufacturing & Building Management System (BMS) segments. The company constructs residential, commercial, industrial, institutional, hospitals, and hospitality; and develops residential properties, hotel premises, industrial parks, retail malls and schools, and community welfare centres. It also manufactures clean room partitions and BMS. Vascon Engineers Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Pune, India.
